Package net.minestom.server.event.inventory

Class InventoryCloseEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.event.Event
net.minestom.server.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent
public class InventoryCloseEvent
extends Event
Called when an Inventory is closed by a player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Gets the new inventory to open.

    Gets the player who closed the inventory.
    void setNewInventory​(Inventory newInventory)
    Can be used to open a new inventory after closing the previous one.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayer

      @NotNull public Player getPlayer()
      Gets the player who closed the inventory.
      Returns:
      the player who closed the inventory

    • getInventory

      @Nullable public Inventory getInventory()
      Gets the closed inventory.
      Returns:
      the closed inventory, null if this is the player inventory

    • getNewInventory

      @Nullable public Inventory getNewInventory()
      Gets the new inventory to open.
      Returns:
      the new inventory to open, null if there isn't any

    • setNewInventory

      public void setNewInventory​(@Nullable Inventory newInventory)
      Can be used to open a new inventory after closing the previous one.
      Parameters:
      newInventory - the inventory to open, null to do not open any
